rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with a wide foyer that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the main entry on the auspicious side, offering ample natural light and ventilation.
Contemporary living room integrated into the ground floor with large windows for natural lighting, open plan design enhancing spatial flow.
Separate dining area adjacent to the living room with access to a small balcony, offering views and fresh air.
Modern kitchen featuring smart appliances and ample storage, positioned to allow for efficient workflow and easy access from the dining area.

openings.description: Main entrance facing North, as per Vastu recommendations ensuring positive energy flow.
Large garage door for two-car parking integrated into ground floor design, conveniently located near the main entry.
Balconies adjoining the dining room and living areas providing outdoor exposure.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, private balcony, designed to enhance comfort and privacy.
Secondary bedroom suitable for children or guests, well-lit with large windows oriented per Vastu guidelines.
Third bedroom designed as a home office or guest room, featuring ample storage and connectivity options.
Ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Private balcony adjoining master bedroom promoting natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Well-equipped private gym area integrated into the penthouse with ample space for exercise and personal training, ensuring privacy through a separate access point.
Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views of the surroundings, designed as an outdoor relaxation and entertainment space.

openings.description: Access from upper floor to rooftop terrace via a secure staircase or lift, ensuring ease of movement.
